TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InstancePersistenceContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 代表持續性命令執行時的執行狀態資訊。

span.span: Represents execution state information while a persistence command is being executed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別的執行個體會傳遞給持續性提供者實作的 TryCommand 方法。An instance of this class is passed to the TryCommand method of persistence provider implementations. 持續性提供者會使用這個類別來檢查此執行個體的記憶體中檢視，以及指出外部存放區上可能會影響檢視或其他記憶體中內容之作業的結果。Persistence providers use this class to inspect the in-memory view of the instance as well as indicate the results of operations on the external store which may affect the view or other in-memory context.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AssociatedInstanceKey(valuetype System.Guid key) cil managed

param.name: key
param.span: 已經相關聯之索引鍵的執行個體索引鍵識別碼。

span.span: The instance key identifier for the key that has been associated.

param.span: 不得為 Guid.Empty。

span.span: Must not be Guid.Empty.

summary.span: 表示持續性提供者已經成功地將索引鍵與執行個體存放區中的目前執行個體產生關聯。

span.span: Indicates that the persistence provider has successfully associated a key to the current instance in the instance store.

summary.span: 此索引鍵的識別碼會指定為參數。

span.span: The identifier of the key is specified as a parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體索引鍵必須是無關聯的。The instance key must be unassociated. 目前的執行個體控制代碼必須繫結至執行個體以及該執行個體的鎖定。The current instance handle must be bound to an instance as well as a lock on that instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public IAsyncResult BeginBindReclaimedLock (long instanceVersion, TimeSpan timeout, AsyncCallback callback, object state);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginBindReclaimedLock(int64 instanceVersion, valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout, class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed
Public Function BeginBindReclaimedLock (instanceVersion As Long, timeout As TimeSpan, callback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult
public: IAsyncResult ^ BeginBindReclaimedLock(long instanceVersion, TimeSpan timeout, AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ state);
member this.BeginBindReclaimedLock : int64 * TimeSpan * AsyncCallback * obj -> IAsyncResult

param.name: instanceVersion
param.span: 在執行個體上保留的鎖定版本，但如果持續性提供者沒有實作鎖定版本，則為零。

span.span: The version of the lock held on the instance, or zero if the persistence provider does not implement lock versions.

param.name: timeout
param.span: 非同步作業的逾時期限。

span.span: The timeout period for the asynchronous operation.

param.name: callback
param.span: 作業完成時要呼叫的方法。

span.span: The method to be called when the operation is completed.

param.name: state
param.span: 與非同步作業相關聯的狀態資訊。

span.span: The state information associated with the asynchronous operation.

summary.span: 開始非同步作業，將執行個體上的現有鎖定繫結至目前執行個體控制代碼。

span.span: Begin an asynchronous operation to bind an existing lock on an instance to the current instance handle.

summary.span: 現有的鎖定版本會當做參數傳遞。

span.span: The version of the existing lock is passed as a parameter.
The status of an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 嘗試取得鎖定時，持續性提供者可能會決定目前的執行個體已經鎖定在目前的存放區中。When attempting to acquire a lock, the persistence provider may decide that the current instance is already locked in the current store. 如果其鎖定權杖符合目前控制代碼的鎖定權杖，則持續性提供者就可以透過檢查鎖定的版本並將它傳遞給 BeginBindReclaimedLock，嘗試回收鎖定。If the lock token matches the current handle’s lock token, then the persistence provider can attempt to reclaim the lock by inspecting its version and passing it to BeginBindReclaimedLock. 在成功回收鎖定之前，持續性提供者不得對執行個體進行變更。The persistence provider must not make changes to the instance until the lock is successfully reclaimed. 如果沒有其他控制代碼繫結至鎖定，則 BeginBindReclaimedLock 作業就會成功，而且目前的控制代碼會變成繫結至鎖定。If no other handle is bound to the lock, then the BeginBindReclaimedLock operation succeeds and the current handle becomes bound to the lock. 否則，BeginBindReclaimedLock 或 EndBindReclaimedLock 會擲回 InstanceHandleConflictException。Otherwise, BeginBindReclaimedLock or EndBindReclaimedLock throws InstanceHandleConflictException. 如果其他控制代碼的命令正在進行，在等候這些命令的結果來決定是否能夠回收鎖定時，此作業可能無法完成。If commands are in progress on other handles, the operation may not complete while waiting for the outcome of those commands to decide whether the lock can be reclaimed. 目前的執行個體控制代碼必須繫結至執行個體和鎖定擁有者。The current instance handle must be bound to an instance and a lock owner. 此執行個體不得為完成。The instance must not be completed. 與鎖定擁有者相關聯的鎖定權杖會用來識別鎖定的擁有者。The lock token associated with the lock owner is used to identify the owner of the lock. 一旦鎖定繫結至控制代碼之後，它就會在控制代碼的存留期內維持繫結狀態。Once a lock is bound to a handle, it remains bound for the lifetime of the handle. 此時，無法變更鎖定權杖或執行個體版本。Neither the lock token nor the instance version can be changed.

MemberSignature.Value: public IAsyncResult BeginExecute (System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstancePersistenceCommand command, TimeSpan timeout, AsyncCallback callback, object state);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginExecute(class System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstancePersistenceCommand command, valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout, class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed
Public Function BeginExecute (command As InstancePersistenceCommand, timeout As TimeSpan, callback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult
public: IAsyncResult ^ BeginExecute(System::Runtime::DurableInstancing::InstancePersistenceCommand ^ command, TimeSpan timeout, AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ state);
member this.BeginExecute : System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstancePersistenceCommand * TimeSpan * AsyncCallback * obj -> IAsyncResult

param.name: command
param.span: 要執行的持續性命令。

span.span: The persistence command to be executed.

param.name: timeout
param.span: 作業的逾時值。

span.span: The time-out value for the operation.

param.name: callback
param.span: 委派，這個委派會接收要求作業完成之非同步接收的通知。

span.span: The delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous receive that a request operation completes.

param.name: state
param.span: 狀態資訊。

span.span: The state information.

summary.span: 開始以非同步方式執行持續性命令。

span.span: Begins executing a persistence command asynchronously.
The status of an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 持續性提供者可以使用這個方法，將子命令當做命令的一部分執行。A persistence provider can use this method to execute sub-commands as part of a command. 此子命令將使用 BeginTryCommand 來執行，與傳遞給 InstanceStore.BeginExecute 的命令很相似。The sub-command will be executed using BeginTryCommand, similar to commands passed to InstanceStore.BeginExecute. 雖然命令可以巢狀化，不過一個命令一次只能執行一個子命令。Commands can be nested, but a command must not execute more than one sub-command at a time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void BindAcquiredLock(int64 instanceVersion) cil managed

param.name: instanceVersion
param.span: 在執行個體上取得的鎖定版本，但如果持續性提供者沒有實作鎖定版本，則為零。

span.span: Version of the lock acquired on the instance, or zero if the persistence provider does not implement lock versions.

summary.span: 將執行個體上新取得的鎖定繫結至目前執行個體控制代碼。

span.span: Binds a newly acquired lock on an instance to the current instance handle.

summary.span: 取得的鎖定版本會當做參數傳遞。

span.span: The version of the acquired lock is passed as a parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果持續性提供者會實作鎖定版本，每次在執行個體上取得鎖定時，外部存放區中的版本都必須遞增一。If a persistence provider implements lock versioning, then each time a lock is acquired on the instance, the version must be incremented by one in the external store. 第一次鎖定執行個體時，版本應該是 1。The first time the instance is locked, the version should be 1. 每次取得鎖定都會讓先前的鎖定失效。Each lock acquisition invalidates the previous lock. 目前的執行個體控制代碼必須繫結至執行個體和鎖定擁有者。The current instance handle must be bound to an instance and a lock owner. 此執行個體不得為完成。The instance must not be completed. 與鎖定擁有者相關聯的鎖定權杖會用來識別鎖定的擁有者。The lock token associated with the lock owner is used to identify the owner of the lock 一旦鎖定繫結至控制代碼之後，它就會在控制代碼的存留期內維持繫結狀態。Once a lock is bound to a handle, it remains bound for the lifetime of the handle. 此時，無法變更鎖定權杖或執行個體版本。Neither the lock token nor the instance version can be changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void BindEvent(class System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstancePersistenceEvent persistenceEvent) cil managed

param.name: persistenceEvent
param.span: 包含事件相關資訊的 物件。

span.span: An object containing information about the event.

summary.span: 將 繫結至執行個體控制代碼。

span.span: Binds an to an instance handle.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void BindInstance(valuetype System.Guid instanceId) cil managed

param.name: instanceId
param.span: 執行個體識別碼。

span.span: An instance identifier.

param.span: 不得為 Guid.Empty。

span.span: Must not be Guid.Empty.

summary.span: 將識別碼已指定為參數的執行個體繫結至目前的執行個體控制代碼。

span.span: Binds an instance whose identifier is specified as a parameter to the current instance handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一旦執行個體繫結至控制代碼之後，它就會在控制代碼的存留期內維持繫結狀態。Once an instance is bound to a handle, it remains bound for the lifetime of the handle. 此時，其他執行個體就無法繫結程序至控制代碼。No other instance can ever be bound to the handle.

MemberSignature.Value: public void BindInstanceOwner (Guid instanceOwnerId, Guid lockToken);

span.span: The lock token of the instance owner.

param.span: 持續性提供者可能會選擇針對執行個體擁有者識別碼和擁有者的鎖定權杖使用相同的值。

span.span: A persistence provider may choose to use the same value for the instance owner identifier and the owner’s lock token.

summary.span: 將執行個體擁有者繫結至目前執行個體控制代碼。

span.span: Binds an instance owner to the current instance handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一旦執行個體擁有者繫結至控制代碼之後，它就會在控制代碼的存留期內維持繫結狀態。Once an instance owner is bound to a handle, it remains bound for the lifetime of the handle. 此時，其他執行個體擁有者就無法繫結程序至控制代碼。No other instance owner can ever be bound to the handle.

MemberSignature.Value: public void BindReclaimedLock (long instanceVersion, TimeSpan timeout);
.method public hidebysig instance void BindReclaimedLock(int64 instanceVersion, valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout) cil managed
Public Sub BindReclaimedLock (instanceVersion As Long, timeout As TimeSpan)
public: void BindReclaimedLock(long instanceVersion, TimeSpan timeout);

param.name: instanceVersion
param.span: 在執行個體上保留的鎖定版本，但如果持續性提供者沒有實作鎖定版本，則為零。

span.span: Version of the lock held on the instance, or zero if the persistence provider does not implement lock versions.

param.name: timeout
param.span: 作業的逾時值。

span.span: The time-out value for the operation.

summary.span: 將執行個體上的現有鎖定繫結至目前執行個體控制代碼。

span.span: Binds an existing lock on an instance to the current instance handle.

summary.span: 現有的鎖定版本會當做參數傳遞。

span.span: The version of the existing lock is passed as a parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 嘗試取得鎖定時，持續性提供者可能會決定目前的執行個體已經鎖定在目前的存放區中。When attempting to acquire a lock, the persistence provider may decide that the current instance is already locked in the current store. 如果其鎖定權杖符合目前控制代碼的鎖定權杖，則持續性提供者就可以透過檢查鎖定的版本並將它傳遞給 BindReclaimedLock，嘗試回收鎖定。If the lock token matches the current handle’s lock token, then the persistence provider can attempt to reclaim the lock by inspecting its version and passing it to BindReclaimedLock. 在成功回收鎖定之前，持續性提供者不得對執行個體進行變更。The persistence provider must not make changes to the instance until the lock is successfully reclaimed. 如果沒有其他控制代碼繫結程序至鎖定，則 BindReclaimedLock 就會成功，而且目前的控制代碼會變成繫結程序至鎖定。If no other handle is bound to the lock, then BindReclaimedLock succeeds and the current handle becomes bound to the lock. 否則，BindReclaimedLock 會擲回 InstanceHandleConflictException。Otherwise, BindReclaimedLock throws InstanceHandleConflictException. 如果其他控制代碼的命令正在進行，BindReclaimedLock 可能會進入封鎖狀態而等候這些命令的結果，然後再決定是否能夠回收鎖定。If commands are in progress on other handles, BindReclaimedLock may block waiting for the outcome of those commands before deciding whether the lock can be reclaimed. 目前的執行個體控制代碼必須繫結至執行個體和鎖定擁有者。The current instance handle must be bound to an instance and a lock owner. 此執行個體不得為完成。The instance must not be completed. 與鎖定擁有者相關聯的鎖定權杖會用來識別鎖定的擁有者。The lock token associated with the lock owner is used to identify the owner of the lock. 一旦鎖定繫結至控制代碼之後，它就會在控制代碼的存留期內維持繫結狀態。Once a lock is bound to a handle, it remains bound for the lifetime of the handle. 此時，無法變更鎖定權杖或執行個體版本。Neither the lock token nor the instance version can be changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CompletedInstance() cil managed

summary.span: 表示持續性提供者已經成功地將執行個體存放區中的目前執行個體標示為完成。

span.span: Indicates that the persistence provider has successfully marked the current instance as complete in the instance store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的執行個體控制代碼必須繫結至執行個體以及該執行個體的鎖定。The current instance handle must be bound to an instance as well as a lock on that instance. 此執行個體必須進行初始化而且尚未完成 The instance must be initialized and not be already completed. (如果執行個體資料集曾經保存到該執行個體，它就會進行初始化)。與該執行個體相關聯的所有索引鍵都必須完成。(An instance is initialized if a set of instance data has ever been persisted to it.) All of the keys associated to the instance must be completed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CompletedInstanceKey(valuetype System.Guid key) cil managed

param.name: key
param.span: 已經完成之索引鍵的執行個體索引鍵識別碼。

span.span: The instance key identifier for the key that has been completed.

param.span: 不得為 Guid.Empty。

span.span: Must not be Guid.Empty.

summary.span: 表示持續性提供者已經成功地將外部存放區中的索引鍵標示為完成。

span.span: Indicates that the persistence provider has successfully marked a key as complete in the external store.

summary.span: 此索引鍵的識別碼會指定為參數。

span.span: The identifier of the key is specified as a parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的執行個體控制代碼必須繫結至執行個體以及該執行個體的鎖定。The current instance handle must be bound to an instance as well as a lock on that instance. 此執行個體索引鍵必須與目前的執行個體相關聯而且尚未完成。The instance key must be associated to the current instance and not be already completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 持續性提供者可以使用這個方法，將子命令當做命令的一部分執行。A persistence provider can use this method to execute sub-commands as part of a command. 此子命令將使用 TryCommand 來執行，與傳遞給 InstanceStore.Execute 的命令很相似。The sub-command will be executed using TryCommand, similar to commands passed to InstanceStore.Execute. 雖然命令可以巢狀化，不過一個命令一次只能執行一個子命令。Commands can be nested, but a command must not execute more than one sub-command at a time.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InstanceHandle As InstanceHandle

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得目前執行個體控制代碼。

span.span: Gets the current instance handle.

value.span: 目前執行個體控制代碼。

span.span: The current instance handle.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InstanceVersion As Long
public: property long InstanceVersion { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前執行個體控制代碼保留在目前執行個體上的鎖定版本。

span.span: Gets the version of the lock held on the current instance by the current instance handle.

value.span: 繫結至目前執行個體控制代碼的執行個體鎖定版本，但如果控制代碼沒有繫結至鎖定，則為 -1。

span.span: The version of the instance lock bound to the current instance handle, or -1 if the handle isn’t bound to a lock.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用繫結至鎖定的控制代碼來執行需要鎖定的作業 (例如保存執行個體資料) 時，持續性提供者應該針對保留在執行個體存放區中之執行個體上的鎖定版本檢查此值。The persistence provider should check this value against the lock version of the lock held on an instance in the instance store when performing an operation that requires a lock (such as persisting instance data) using a handle bound to the lock. 如果鎖定版本不符，此命令應該會由於 InstanceLockLostException 而失敗。If the lock version doesn’t match, the command should fail with InstanceLockLostException.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InstanceView As InstanceView

span.span: Gets the instance view object that represents the in-memory state of the current instance.

summary.span: 當進行中的命令進行更新時，這個檢視就會反映更新。

span.span: This view reflects updates as they are made by the command in progress.
The instance view object.

MemberSignature.Value: public void LoadedInstance (System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceState state, System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Xml.Linq.XName,System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceValue> instanceData, System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Xml.Linq.XName,System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceValue> instanceMetadata, System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<Guid,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Xml.Linq.XName,System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceValue>> associatedInstanceKeyMetadata, System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<Guid,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<System.Xml.Linq.XName,System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceValue>> completedInstanceKeyMetadata);

.method public hidebysig instance void LoadedInstance(valuetype System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceState state, class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<class System.Xml.Linq.XName, class System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceValue> instanceData, class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<class System.Xml.Linq.XName, class System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceValue> instanceMetadata, class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<valuetype System.Guid, class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<class System.Xml.Linq.XName, class System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceValue>> associatedInstanceKeyMetadata, class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<valuetype System.Guid, class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<class System.Xml.Linq.XName, class System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceValue>> completedInstanceKeyMetadata) cil managed

Public Sub LoadedInstance (state As InstanceState, instanceData As IDictionary(Of XName, InstanceValue), instanceMetadata As IDictionary(Of XName, InstanceValue), associatedInstanceKeyMetadata As IDictionary(Of Guid, IDictionary(Of XName, InstanceValue)), completedInstanceKeyMetadata As IDictionary(Of Guid, IDictionary(Of XName, InstanceValue)))

public: void LoadedInstance(System::Runtime::DurableInstancing::InstanceState state, System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Xml::Linq::XName ^, System::Runtime::DurableInstancing::InstanceValue ^> ^ instanceData, System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Xml::Linq::XName ^, System::Runtime::DurableInstancing::InstanceValue ^> ^ instanceMetadata, System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<Guid, System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Xml::Linq::XName ^, System::Runtime::DurableInstancing::InstanceValue ^> ^> ^ associatedInstanceKeyMetadata, System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<Guid, System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::Xml::Linq::XName ^, System::Runtime::DurableInstancing::InstanceValue ^> ^> ^ completedInstanceKeyMetadata);

param.name: state
param.span: 執行個體狀態資訊。

span.span: The instance state information.

param.name: instanceData
param.span: 做為 和 物件之字典的執行個體資料。

span.span: The instance data as a dictionary of and objects.

param.name: instanceMetadata
param.span: 做為 和 物件之集合的執行個體中繼資料。

span.span: Instance metadata as a collection of and objects.

param.name: associatedInstanceKeyMetadata
param.span: 做為執行個體識別項和執行個體索引鍵中繼資料之字典的相關聯執行個體索引鍵中繼資料，該中繼資料是 和 物件的字典。

span.span: Associated instance key metadata as a dictionary of instance identifier and instance key metadata, which is a dictionary of and objects.

param.name: completedInstanceKeyMetadata
param.span: 做為執行個體識別碼和執行個體索引鍵中繼資料之字典的已完成執行個體中繼資料，這個中繼資料是 和 物件的字典。

span.span: Completed instance metadata as a dictionary of instance identifier and instance key metadata, which is a dictionary of and objects.

summary.span: 表示持續性提供者已經成功地從執行個體存放區中擷取目前的執行個體。

span.span: Indicates that the persistence provider has successfully retrieved the current instance from the instance store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的執行個體控制代碼必須繫結至執行個體。The current instance handle must be bound to an instance. 如果此執行個體控制代碼繫結程序至鎖定或已載入的執行個體標示為完成，已載入的資料就會被視為一致的，否則這項資料就會被視為不確定。If the instance handle is bound to a lock or the loaded instance is marked as complete, the loaded data is considered to be consistent; otherwise, it is considered to be in doubt.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LockToken As Guid
public: property Guid LockToken { Guid get(); };

summary.span: 取得繫結至目前執行個體控制代碼之執行個體擁有者的鎖定權杖。

span.span: Gets the lock token of the instance owner bound to the current instance handle.

value.span: 繫結至目前執行個體控制代碼的鎖定權杖，但如果控制代碼沒有繫結至執行個體擁有者，則為 Guid.Empty。

span.span: The lock token bound to the current instance handle, or Guid.Empty if the handle isn’t bound to an instance owner.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用繫結至鎖定的控制代碼來執行需要鎖定的作業 (例如保存執行個體資料) 時，持續性提供者應該針對保留在執行個體存放區中之執行個體上的鎖定權杖檢查此值。The persistence provider should check this value against the lock token of the lock held on an instance in the instance store when performing an operation that requires a lock (such as persisting instance data) using a handle bound to the lock. 如果鎖定權杖不符，此命令應該會由於 InstanceLockLostException 而失敗。If the lock token doesn’t match, the command should fail with InstanceLockLostException. 取得執行個體的新鎖定 (例如使用尚未繫結至鎖定的控制代碼來保存執行個體資料) 時，持續性提供者應該使用這個值當做鎖定權杖。The persistence provider should use this value as the lock token when acquiring a new lock on an instance (such as persisting instance data using a handle not already bound to a lock). 如果執行個體已經在執行個體存放區中鎖定，而且其鎖定權杖符合這個鎖定權杖，持續性提供者就可以嘗試使用 BindReclaimedLock 來回收執行個體。If the instance is already locked in the instance store and the lock token matches this lock token, the persistence provider can attempt to reclaim the instance using BindReclaimedLock.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PersistedInstance(class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<class System.Xml.Linq.XName, class System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceValue> data) cil managed
Public Sub PersistedInstance (data As IDictionary(Of XName, InstanceValue))

param.name: data
param.span: 做為 和 物件之字典的執行個體資料。

span.span: Instance data as a dictionary of and objects.

summary.span: 表示持續性提供者已經成功地將執行個體資料集保存到執行個體存放區。

span.span: Indicates that the persistence provider has successfully persisted a set of instance data to the instance store.

summary.span: 如果執行個體尚未初始化，這就具有初始化執行個體的作用。

span.span: This has the effect of initializing the instance if it wasn’t already.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的執行個體控制代碼必須繫結至執行個體以及該執行個體的鎖定。The current instance handle must be bound to an instance as well as a lock on that instance. 每個執行個體資料集都會完全取代先前的資料集。Each set of instance data completely replaces the previous set. 執行個體資料集可能為 null，也就是空白。The set of instance data may be null – this is the same as empty. 保存 null 的執行個體資料集會刪除現有的執行個體資料集 Persisting a null set of instance data deletes the existing set of instance data. (保存執行個體資料集完全不會影響執行個體中繼資料)。(Persisting a set of instance data has no effect on instance metadata.)

param.name: key
param.span: 已讀取其中繼資料之索引鍵的執行個體索引鍵識別碼。

span.span: The instance key identifier for the key whose metadata was read.

param.span: 不得為 Guid.Empty。

span.span: Must not be Guid.Empty.

span.span: The metadata as a dictionary of and objects.

span.span: if the metadata represents all of the metadata associated to the instance key, otherwise .

summary.span: 表示持續性提供者已經成功地針對與執行個體存放區中目前執行個體相關聯的索引鍵，讀取某些執行個體索引鍵中繼資料。

span.span: Indicates that the persistence provider has successfully read some instance key metadata for a key associated to the current instance from the instance store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的執行個體控制代碼必須繫結至執行個體。The current instance handle must be bound to an instance. 如果此執行個體控制代碼繫結程序至鎖定或目前的執行個體標示為完成，此中繼資料就會被視為一致的，否則這項資料就會被視為不確定。If the instance handle is bound to a lock or the current instance is marked as complete, the metadata is considered to be consistent; otherwise, it is considered to be in doubt.

span.span: Indicates that the persistence provider has successfully read some instance metadata for the current instance from the instance store.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetCancellationHandler(class System.Action`1<class System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstancePersistenceContext> cancellationHandler) cil managed
Public Sub SetCancellationHandler (cancellationHandler As Action(Of InstancePersistenceContext))

param.name: cancellationHandler
param.span: 要呼叫之函式的參考。

span.span: The reference to a function to be called.

summary.span: 設定要求取消作業時要呼叫的取消處理常式。

span.span: Sets the cancellation handler to be called when the cancel of an operation is requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果呼叫了取消處理常式，持續性提供者就應該取消所有暫止的作業，並且從 TryCommand 擲回 OperationCanceledException，表示持續性命令在完成之前已經被中斷。If the cancellation handler is called, the persistence provider should cancel all pending operations and throw OperationCanceledException from TryCommand to indicate that the persistence command was interrupted before it could be completed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void UnassociatedInstanceKey(valuetype System.Guid key) cil managed

param.name: key
param.span: 已經解除關聯之索引鍵的執行個體索引鍵識別碼。

span.span: The instance key identifier for the key that has been unassociated.

param.span: 不得為 Guid.Empty。

span.span: Must not be Guid.Empty.

summary.span: 表示持續性提供者已經成功地將索引鍵與執行個體存放區中的目前執行個體解除關聯。

span.span: Indicates that the persistence provider has successfully disassociated a key from the current instance in the instance store.

summary.span: 此索引鍵的識別碼會指定為參數。

span.span: The identifier of the key is specified as a parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的執行個體控制代碼必須繫結至執行個體以及該執行個體的鎖定。The current instance handle must be bound to an instance as well as a lock on that instance. 此執行個體索引鍵必須與目前的執行個體相關聯而且標示為完成。The instance key must be associated to the current instance and must be marked complete. 目前的執行個體不得標示為完成。The current instance must not be marked complete.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UserContext As Object
public: property System::Object ^ UserContext { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得附加至目前執行個體控制代碼的使用者內容資訊。

span.span: Gets the user context information attached to the current instance handle.
The user context information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此物件是從目前執行個體控制代碼之 InstanceStore.OnNewInstanceHandle 傳回的物件。The object is the one that is returned from InstanceStore.OnNewInstanceHandle for the current instance handle.

param.name: key

span.span: The instance key identifier for the key.

param.span: 不得為 Guid.Empty。

span.span: Must not be Guid.Empty.

param.name: name
param.span: 中繼資料屬性的名稱。

span.span: The name of the metadata property.

param.name: value
param.span: 中繼資料屬性的值。

summary.span: 表示持續性提供者已經成功地將與目前執行個體相關聯之執行個體索引鍵的中繼資料值寫入執行個體存放區。

span.span: Indicates that the persistence provider has successfully written a metadata value for an instance key that is associated with the current instance to the instance store

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的執行個體控制代碼必須繫結至執行個體以及該執行個體的鎖定。The current instance handle must be bound to an instance as well as a lock on that instance. 此執行個體索引鍵必須與目前的執行個體相關聯而且不得為完成。The instance key must be associated with the current instance and must not be completed.
